title: Classic Machu Picchu Trek
summary: Experience the world's most famous trek along the ancient Inca Trail to reach the magnificent citadel of Machu Picchu. This 4-day journey combines challenging hiking, breathtaking Andean scenery, and fascinating archaeological sites.
description: The Classic Inca Trail to Machu Picchu is the most iconic trek in South America, following the original stone-paved path built by the Incas over 500 years ago. This 4-day adventure takes you through diverse ecosystems, from high Andean puna to lush cloud forests, while visiting impressive Inca ruins along the way. The journey culminates with a sunrise arrival at the Sun Gate (Inti Punku) for your first magical view of Machu Picchu.
included: Emergency oxygen and first aid kit
physicalRequirement: Good fitness level required. This trek involves long days of hiking (6-8 hours) with significant elevation changes.

itinerary.title: Cusco to Wayllabamba
itinerary.description: Begin your adventure with pickup from Cusco and transfer to Ollantaytambo for breakfast. Start trekking from Wayllabamba village through beautiful Andean landscapes.

itinerary.title: Wayllabamba to Pacaymayo
itinerary.description: The most challenging day as you cross the highest point of the trail, Dead Woman's Pass (4,215m). Enjoy spectacular mountain views and cloud forest landscapes.
activities: Early morning ascent to Dead Woman's Pass

itinerary.title: Pacaymayo to Wiñay Wayna
itinerary.description: Explore fascinating Inca ruins including Runkurakay and Sayacmarca. Visit the spectacular Wiñay Wayna archaeological complex in the afternoon.

itinerary.title: Wiñay Wayna to Machu Picchu
itinerary.description: Early morning hike to the Sun Gate (Inti Punku) for the first magical view of Machu Picchu. Descend to the citadel for a comprehensive guided tour.
activities: Early morning hike to Sun Gate
